physical_appearance: The image shows a black-and-white photograph. It is rectangular and it features a waterfall. This photograph was taken at the apex of the waterfall. There are trees and greenery on either side of the waterfall, as well as at the bottom.
title_text: Top view of Kota Tinggi Waterfall Photography Album (donation from Anthony Robert Saint Claire)
subject_terms_2: Black-and-white photography Kota Tinggi (Johor, Malaysia) Waterfalls
